name: Dillon's Rolling Western
synopsis: Ravenous rock monsters are raiding villages to feast on their livestock, and there's only one armadillo tough enough to stop them: ranger Dillon! Defend villages against waves of creatures - building gun towers and lookouts - and battle the varmints with Dillon's sharp claws, awesome Roll Attack, Grind Attack and more.
